DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study is the analysis of two inhibitors of Ach-E: galantamine and donépézil in over 65 years' old patients suffering from Alzheimer disease (MMSE between 20 and 26) without Alzheimer's medication.
DOC.detailed_description: Feasibility study, open, randomized, controlled, cross-over study in 65 years old patients.
DOC.criteria: 65 and over years old Patients suffering from Alzheimer disease Patient living with someone at home Written consent given Galantamine or Donepezil hypersensibility Patient living alone and in a medicalized structure Concomitant medication Chronical diseases
